title: Route53 Domain Transfer Lock Disabled
description: Detects the disabling of domain transfer locking. Attackers disable this lock to transfer your organization's domain name to another registrar (Domain Hijacking).
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Legitimate business decision to transfer domain management (should be highly regulated)
recommendation: If this was not a C-level authorized decision, re-enable the lock immediately and lock down the AWS account.
